title: This is Farnborough
creator_credit: British Movietone News and Central Office of Information
brief_description: A record of the 20th Flying Display and Exhibition, 1959, at Farnborough of the Society of British Aircraft Constructors. Spectacular group flying by Royal Navy Scimitars and RAF Hunters; Britain’s principle guided missiles; the Short SC1 research aircraft; the Fairey Rotodyne; various helicopter designs; the Saunders-Rose Hovercraft.
